channel.title: Connection refused: connect
channel.description:
Ok, I downloaded this source + client. It is all good, except when I give the client to people. This comes up when they load client: [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/swr4wo.jpg[/img]
And it says: Could not find Java Virtual Machine.
This is a Pi client and an emulous source. Also, even though question 2 is in the wrong section,
1. How do I change the ip on a Pi client? Same? Client.java? 2. How do I change the ip on an Emulous source? Same? Client.java?
Help? Rep++

item.title: Connection refused: connect
